message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
I think a 60-40 split in my favor is more fair, considering we both lose money with each round.
Considering the inflation, I'm being generous with 58-42, take it before it's too late!
I'm willing to split it 65-35 in my favor, but I'm not going lower. Inflation is hurting us both, so let's get this done.
